document.heading: District of Columbia Auditor Subpoena and Oath Authority Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-146, the “District of Columbia Auditor Subpoena and Oath Authority Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-394, which was referred to Committee on the Whole The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 6, 2004, and February 3, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 19, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-367 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-146 became effective on April 22, 2004.
